Class FloridianDentalRecords

java.lang.Object
FloridianDentalRecords
public class FloridianDentalRecords extends Object
Record the teeth records for a family.
Author:
Marissa Turja

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Character value of 'U' or 'L' corresponding to the tooth layer.

    • checkToothNumber

      private static int checkToothNumber(int toothNumber, char[][][] familyToothTypes, int familyMemberIndex, int toothLayerIndex)
      Check if the tooth number is a valid option.
      Parameters:
      toothNumber - Inputted tooth number being checked
      familyToothTypes - Array containing the family's tooth records
      familyMemberIndex - Integer corresponding to the family member's index in the array
      toothLayerIndex - Integer corresponding to the tooth layer's index in the array
      Returns:
      Integer of a valid tooth number
